COULD_YOU_REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: Could you repeat the original request?

FACTION_RECRUITMENT_CONFED.message: CONFEDERATE NAVY: Do your part in the glory of the empire. Contact us if you dare!

FACTION_RECRUITMENT_FED.message: FEDERAL FLEET: We want YOU for ADVENTURES unlimited.

FACTION_RECRUITMENT_HABER.message: HABER DEFENCE AUTHORITY: Serve to uphold Haber's space dominion.

MSG_FAILURE.message: You have failed to meet the mission criteria.

WHAT_IF_FAIL_Q.description: Referring to not finishing accepted mission before deadline
WHAT_IF_FAIL_Q.message: What happens if I don't finish in time?

WHAT_IF_FAIL_A.message: Only start missions you can complete, but it's better to finish late than not at all. You will not be paid, and it may affect future missions and promotions.

WILL_I_BE_IN_ANY_DANGER.message: Will I be in any danger?
